#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long revers(int a);
int main()
{
    long n,a;
    int t,sum ;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        cin >> n;
        sum = 0;
        while(a != n){
            n += revers(n);
            a = revers(n);
            sum++;
        }
        cout << sum << " " << n << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
long revers(int a)
{
    long r,sum = 0;
    while(a != 0){
        r = a % 10;
        sum = sum * 10 + r;
        a = a/10;
    }
    return sum;
}
